column2: (verb) to change something slightly yo make it fit or work better
(adj) based on chance rather than being planned or based on reason
(noun) the number below the line in a fraction
(adj) an exponential rate to increase becomes quicker and quicker as the thing that increases becomes larger
(verb) to make something as great in amount, size or importance as possible
(noun) in two or more lines, streets, are parallel, the distances between them is same all along their length
(noun) the number or amount of a group or part of something when compared to the whole // the number, amount, or level of one thing when compared to another
(noun) the speed at which something happens or changes, or the amount or number of times it happens or changes in a particular period
(noun) a series of related things or events, or the order in which they follow each other
